item.description:
Lets do the Pine Hills. Meet at Metro at 7:30 for Breakfast. If you can't make breakfast, come to Metro's by 8:45 to join us for a hike.

If you haven't hiked the Pine Hills, we will probably go up Manomet Hill, which offers some reasonably steep hills and nice views of the coast. Wear good boots.  Bring water and snacks. Dress in layers because you may be cold at the start but will warm up quickly. It doesn't look like snowshoes will be required.

Metro's Cafe on Route 3a in Manomet has decent coffee and offers a $2.95 early bird special  (eggs, meat, toast, home fries).

group.name: Friends of Myles Standish State Forest Meetup Group

item.name: Pine Hills
